Module gmit.software
Package ie.gmit.sw.observers

Class KnightObserver

  • java.lang.Object
    • ie.gmit.sw.observers.KnightObserver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    KeyObserver
    public class KnightObserver
extends java.lang.Object
implements KeyObserver
    Provides the implementation of the KeyObserver interface and updates Knight objects based on key events..
    Author:
    Gary Connlly

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      KnightObserver()
      Gets a handle on all the Knight objects that exist in the game.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void update​(java.awt.event.KeyEvent e)
      Updates the view depending on what key was pressed.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • KnightObserver

        public KnightObserver()
        Gets a handle on all the Knight objects that exist in the game. Gets a handle on the KeyPressed singleton object. Adds itself as an observer to the KeyPressed list of observers.

    • Method Detail

        public void update​(java.awt.event.KeyEvent e)
        Updates the view depending on what key was pressed.
